```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)

shark_top <- c("NA", 2, 7, 7, 6, 3)
shark_down <- c("NA", -1, -2, -3, -3, 2)
shark_fin_1 <- c(5, 2)
shark_fin_2 <- c(-5, 2)

# Plot dat shark

plot(shark_top, type="o", col="red", ylim=c(-10,10))
lines(shark_down)
lines(shark_fin_1, type="o", pch=22, lty=2, col="red")
lines(shark_fin_2, type="o", pch=22, lty=2, col="red")

# Create a title with a red, bold/italic font
title(main="Sharky", col.main="red", font.main=4)

```
